summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Hilton Art portfolio application. All major pages load correctly with proper UI components, forms, and navigation. Application is fully responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports.

integration_issues.issue: Navigation elements become detached from DOM during route transitions, causing click failures

design_issues.issue: Missing 'sizes' prop warning for images with fill attribute

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, artist name (Hilton), and proper branding
Gallery page loads with filters (category, availability) and proper layout
Commission page renders with all required form fields (name, email, type, size, budget, reference image, instructions)
Track Order page renders with email and order ID form fields
Login page renders with email/password form and correct branding
Floating navigation present on all public pages (home, gallery, commission, track-order)
Floating navigation correctly hidden on login page
All pages are responsive (desktop 1920x1080, tablet 768x1024, mobile 390x844)
Footer present on all public pages
All form fields have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Navigation items (Home, Gallery, Commission, Track, Admin) all present and properly structured
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor navigation timing issue during route transitions - elements become detached from DOM. Consider adding proper wait conditions or using Next.js router events for navigation testing. Also add 'sizes' prop to Next.js Image components to resolve console warnings.
success_percentage: frontend: 95% - All core functionality working, minor navigation timing issue
